abstract: Elan Frank wants to make a film about Arnon Milchan, a Hollywood film producer who moonlighted for an Israeli intelligence agency, but Mr. Milchan has declined interview requests.
snippet: Elan Frank wants to make a film about Arnon Milchan, a Hollywood film producer who moonlighted for an Israeli intelligence agency, but Mr. Milchan has declined interview requests.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — You don’t want an Israeli Air Force pilot on your tail, especially not the kind who has turned documentary filmmaker.

headline.main: A Filmmaker Chases an Israeli Spy Story
